village.title: Your village
village.empty: You don't have any villages to view yet. You can click on the 'Add' button in the top right corner to add a village to track its upgrade status.

clans.title: Your clans
clans.empty: You don't have any tribes to view yet. You can click on the 'Add' button in the top right corner to add a tribe to track its various statuses.
